Nice little private place on beautiful grounds. Waking up to hear all the different birds was one of my favorite parts of Caroline is extremely nice and an over the top host who made sure my stay was pleasant. Thank you!

What a welcoming and cozy place to visit! My son wanted a farm stay and appreciated the opportunity to help with chores. The cake we ordered was impressively decorated and quite delicious! Ruby is a great host :)
Ruby was GREAT. She made sure everything was ready. The atmosphere was amazing. She was very responsive of my request. I'll be back

Great place to stay at. My friends and I wished we could stay longer! Hopefully we can come next time and stay longer. It was very comfortable and we felt safe there. Ruby is a wonderful host and communicated with us about how to get to her house. Loved our stay!

We can't say enough good things about our stay! The bed was comfortable, there were plenty of amenities to make it feel like home, the trail was incredibly fun, the animals were friendly, and we had a great time chatting with Ruby and her family. We opted for the hot tub and did NOT regret it. Ruby showed our boys how to feed the animals, gave suggestions for local things to do, and was always quick to respond to any messages. We can't wait to go back :)

Ruby's place is more beautiful in person than what the pictures can show! Ruby works hard to make the carriage house welcoming, comfortable, and very clean for her guests and it shows in all the little details. You get to feel what it is like to be on a small farm complete with baby goats, chickens, horses, friendly dogs, and even a pig. Having lived on a farm, I appreciated all the care and hard work that Ruby puts in each day to caring for her animals as well as the guests that she welcomes onto her home. Thank you so much, Ruby, for offering a rural paradise oasis to us for a day.
Super amazing, five star, country getaway.

Ruby is an amazing host. From my first inquiry through to the end of the stay she was helpful and responsive. The house comfortable and clean and exactly as described and as was represented in the pics. The farm itself is beautiful and peaceful and filled with lots animals to keep the kids occupied and happy. It’s a great place and will definitely stay there again. Great for kids and/or adults.
Perfect rural getaway in a lovely setting with a quaintly decorated cottage. Animals were a fun addition! Very friendly host and accommodating. Would absolutely recommend!

One of my favorite Airbnbs so far! The baby goats right outside the stay and a nice little walk behind the houses. That swim spa was super clean and relaxing especially at night while looking up at the stars. We also had the privilege of meeting Ruby and had a little chat, she's super helpful!
Wonderful stay. We really enjoyed our time here and would love to come back sometime. It was fun to see all the animals and the waterfall was beautiful.

Rubys place was such a peaceful escape from the city. Our experience was great. Place is legit, has everything you’ll need.
Loved it and we will b back!!
Great place!
This is our third time coming to Ruby's place, and Everytime she goes above and beyond. We can't wait until our next trip.
This was our favorite place to stay yet. Everything was beautiful and peaceful, Ruby was kind and knowledgeable of the land history. A wonderful host and stay.
Great host! Would definitely stay again!
Makes you feel instantly welcomed. Wish could have stayed longer. First place ever to have blankets avail in the closet!! 6 stars

We picked Ruby's place to celebrate our 50th anniversary and had a great time. I wish we had taken more time to visit with Ruby and her family. She is a joy! She answered any questions immediately. Her recommendations for grocery store, restaurant and sights were spot on. The apple pie that was waiting for us was out of this world good!! The carriage house was clean, and so well stocked.,. probably the best that we've ever had. The hot tub was so nice after a day of traveling and sightseeing. The weather was not the best, but we plan to go back when it's warmer so we can find the waterfall and do some exploring. I would definitely recommend Ruby's place.
Great place to stay! Secluded location away from busy city to escape the noise. Quiet and peaceful stay, even with the animals right outside! Would recommend to anyone coming to the area.
We enjoyed everything about this stay!

This stay has been so nice - it was like a wonderland driving onto the beautiful property and being greeted by the most adorable dogs and farm animals. We are from the city so don’t get to see all this cuteness up close. Ruby was very communicative and we found it easy to find the place and check in was a breeze. The home was very comfortable and clean. We wish we had longer to stay because she has the best variety of books - we could stay just to read through them! There was nothing that we missed or felt like we forgot because this air bnb has everything we needed. Thanks!
We are absolutely in LOVE with this air bnb! Photos are really accurate and the nature is so charming! Ruby was responsive and I loved all the details (including the cake!). We will be back!
Ruby is a spectacular host and very accommodating in ways that made our stay one we want to repeat.

We had an absolutely fantastic stay at Ruby's place. We were looking for a place off the beaten path for a relaxing, peaceful get-away without our kids and Ruby's place delivered. The carriage house was the perfect size and is super clean and cozy. Sitting in the hot tub under the stars at night was one of the highlights. Ruby is a fantastic host. She is responsive to messages, and so friendly and helpful. We would definitely return!
Nice escape into private property. Calming being close to all of Ruby’s animals and quiet land. Kitchen was well equipped and the home had everything we needed. Thank you Ruby!

Myself, and three young sons stayed in the cottage house for a few days over Spring break. The four of us love hiking and exploring so Ruby’s farm, trails, and woodland area was great! My three minis loved the barnyard area, animals, and pastures. We also had some leisurely swim time in the outdoor heated swim spa. I recommend Ruby’s place if you’re looking to unplug, and unwind! Thanks, Ruby!

This was a beautiful location and very peaceful, wonderful stay! The animals were all super cute and well behaved, which was a nice treat on our stay! Everything indoors was clean. The kitchen had everything we needed to make a little dinner and tidy up afterwards!
The walking paths were gorgeous and easy to follow—very much worth taking advantage of if you stay here. The property is gorgeous in general! We were also able to use the hot tub which was an amazing experience. The stars were clear, and everything was clean, well functioning, and very worth it :) there were even robes available for use.
Ruby was extremely responsive to any questions or needs we came across. Extremely friendly and helpful with regard to making recommendations nearby. Overall an absolutely amazing stay! Highly recommend, and would definitely stay again!!

A great place for a personal retreat, or like what we enjoyed- a father/son getaway. Plenty of trails to “get lost” on, but the farm animals always called you home when you weren’t quite sure which direction you were going :) The workout room was on point, and the hot tub was a perfect way to end each day.

Such a beautiful spot. We loved our stay. Cutest animals, nicest family, amazing amenities & the perfect trail for walking! The place was very homey & very comfortable. We loved it. Perfect private getaway. Will definitely be back!

We really enjoyed our stay at Ruby's. We were specifically looking for a place with a hot tub and this fit the bill perfectly! I don't think we could have asked for a better setup! It was a short walk from the carriage house, but nothing too difficult (it was even icy when we went). She also allows you access to the yoga studio that we only used to dry off, but it was nice to get out of the freezing rain when doing so. You are near a highway, but traffic dies down quite a bit when it gets dark...we didn't even notice it after awhile. We'd definitely stay here again!

This was a lovely spot for a relaxing getaway. The carriage house is quaint and charming. I loved my walk to the waterfall and the fitness center was an added bonus. I had everything I needed to rest and recharge.
great place very beautiful and clean had a good time with peace and quite.

We thoroughly enjoyed this low key & homey gem! Great for a quiet getaway! We felt right at home in this charming carriage house & loved the property & animals. Not far from places to eat & things to do! We stayed here for our visit to Snow Creek (about 20 mins away) and will definitely book again in the future!

Ruby's place is just as described. She makes sure you have everything you need and is super nice and informative. If you want to shop or find a place to eat she has suggestions for you. My sister, niece and I stayed 2 nights for a girls weekend and it was so relaxing. We had everything we needed and then some. I had a great night's sleep on a super comfortable mattress. Great Coffee/Tea bar. And all we had to bring in the kitchen was food. We went hiking and found the MUST SEE waterfall. It was all iced over and so beautiful. The animals were a lot of fun too. And the workout room and swim spa were awesome. We are all talking about going back. Ruby is a super host!

I stayed here one night on a long journey between Florida and South Dakota. This place was so peaceful, perfectly clean, and Ruby fed me both dinner and breakfast. She’s an awesome host and chef. The horse, the dog and all the chickens make a great welcome committee! I highly recommend this place. 🙏🏽🎉

Me and my husband had an AMAZING time. Ruby was so thoughtful and caring to our needs. Helped us find breakfast places, good restaurants etc. The house was clean, smelled so good, the bathtub water was so nice and hot. Would recommend it and plan on going again.

Ruby’s place was just as beautiful as it looked online. The animals were adorable, the carriage house was filled with everything you could possibly need. We enjoyed a buckeye cake from her pastry chef sister. We enjoyed going to Westin which is nearby where there were lots of cute bars and antique shops. 10 out of 10 would recommend and hope to go again in the warmer months.
Had a great stay at Wilver Dell Farm! Really enjoyed the trails on the property that led down to the creek. Beautiful place and comfy carriage house.

Perfect little getaway weekend, lovely shopping and dining nearby. The animals were all friendly and Ruby gave me an apple for Percy!! 🤩 I definitely want to return later when the weather is warmer to explore the trails and find the waterfall.

We enjoyed our peaceful stay at Ruby’s. The view of the farm was pleasant, the walks in the woods restful, and the house arranged in a very comfortable and livable way. The hot tub was a treat! It was great to get away from the noise of town and the stress of daily life at this peaceful farm house, and super fun to see how they had organized the space of the Carriage House. I hope to be back some time.
Ruby’s place was a wonderful treat. A tranquil and relaxing setting. Wonderful woods and beautiful sunsets.

My girlfriend and I loved this place! It was a great getaway. The house was adorable and the animals were really cool. The hot tub is pretty far from the house, so not super practical in winter months. We had a great stay!
Ruby’s place was beautiful and very cozy I would love to visit it again and for longer!
Another great trip at Ruby’s we cannot wait to go back
Can’t wait to come back! Love staying here.
Love staying here. Can’t wait to come back.
We enjoyed our stay!

We LOVED staying at the Carriage House! Unfortunately we only stayed for one night, but it was so worth it! The house is so cozy and has everything you could possibly need. The property is beautiful and peaceful, and the animals are amazing. We are excited to visit again! Definitely suggest taking a hike to the waterfall no matter the season!

We couldn't believe we were staying in such a beautiful place for the price. The animals were gorgeous, from the roosters to Stella the big white fluffy dog. The entire home is decorated with books and knickknacks that give you a glimse into the hosts spectacular personality. The host was cheerful and friendly, busy doing farmwork as we packed our truck to get back on the road. We wish we could have stayed longer.

This rental was exactly what my family and I were looking for. We wanted peace and quiet. We wanted nature and to disconnect from the outside world. We put down our phones and just enjoyed life.
The animals there were great, very friendly. My daughter who wants to be a veterinarian was in heaven. She was invited one morning to feed the animals, she couldnt have had a better trip.
The amenities were great, hot tub and work out facility were all utilized.
The host, Ruby was nothing but exemplary. Very responsive to all my questions in a timely manner and was very accommodating.
all in all we had an amazing time. Would definitely go again which im positive we will and would highly recommend this beautiful AirBnB.

It’s very peaceful. Ruby has a beautiful carriage home and she had lots of extra touches such as a flashlight by the door, candles and lighters, a Brita water pitcher in the fridge, extra blankets, and lots of books. I liked having such a large house with several places to work and play, a desk, a romantic table for two, the living room with a comfortable couch.
We loved the beautiful animals. It was fun to watch them in their home whether it was the sleeping pot bellied pig - they make the most interesting snoring noises!, the chickens wandering around and taking dust baths or the roosters crowing, the ducks shaking their tail feathers. We got lucky and were able to watch the horse roll around nearly upside down and then snake himself off. The dogs are beautiful and so loving. The cats are fun to pet. I really enjoyed my little spot in the universe seeing them all in theirs and knowing they are well cared for and loved.
Ruby has an amazing house and it is all a breath of fresh air.

This place is beautiful. You have all the amenities you need in the house, which is adorable, spacious, homey and clean. But the true showstopper is the property. Such a cute barnyard with friendly animals. A property with an amazing history. And hiking trails that lead to two different waterfalls. We were accompanied on our hike by the resident dog and cat. 😂 I highly recommend the fitness studio and hot tub. Ruby was so friendly. I can’t wait to go back again!
Very sweet animals in a very relaxing environment

This place is amazing, and it was just what i was looking for. So refreshing and restorative for my soul—pastures, animals, wooded hikes, plus a super comfortable place to stay and curl up with a book.
Ruby is such a fun, hard-working person and responds quickly if anything comes up. I utilized the exercise room and LOVED it too… the hot tub under the stars was awesome.
I was concerned about possible noise, as I’m a light sleeper, but I really didn’t hear much (with the sound machine like i use at home, too) and it wasn’t a big deal. There was a night that Ruby had brought two new calves that were kinda unhappy about being separated from their moms, and their mooing was loud. But, it didn’t bother me much, and kinda added to the experience (and plus i think it was an exception as they will be put out to pasture normally).
The only problem is that now i want to move to the country. Haha.
I will definitely be back.

The carriage house at Ruby’s is the perfect serene getaway in the hills, with all of the comforts necessary to effortlessly enjoy your peace. Sitting outside my first morning for breakfast, I was joined by the most hospitable grey cat, a symphony of roosters & hens, & a collection of horses, dogs, ducks & a leisurely pig. Day two brought the rain, & with the heater up & movies streaming, it was all the cozy vibes.
Ruby is so very kind, & was wonderfully helpful with any questions—from nearby grocery stores to how to keep the house warm when the weather turned. I absolutely recommend a stay at Ruby’s, & look forward to a return visit should I pass through again.
The amenities are immense. Love the soft sheets and WIFI connection was very fast. Anything I needed, I found. It was like you thought of everything. The grounds and trail were breathtaking.

This was probably my favorite AirBNB that I've stayed at so far! Loved being around the horses, chickens, and the pig. The dogs and barn cats were super sweet and friendly. Ruby was an excellent, communicative host that made us very comfortable during our stay. I can't think of a single negative thing to say. The trails nearby are beautiful as well.

Ruby's carriage house is a charming, clean, well-kept-up slice of farm life, petting zoo, hiking trails, yoga/exercise studio and gourmet restaurant all rolled up in one! My friend and I spent 2 very relaxing days there recently. The farm animals were friendly and very comfortable around the 2 of us. Ruby, the hostess and owner, is fun and friendly, and very ready to share the interesting information about the historic property and home that she and her family live in, and the carriage house we were in. Ruby is also a master chef! We had her outstanding Indian meal option for dinner one night, delivered to us by her very gracious husband and adorable young daughter. Ruby brought over a delicious breakfast frittata and fruit for breakfast the next day. Service with a smile, both times. Lovely hosts and really great hospitality. Great coffee/tea bar. The bathroom has a great shower/tub stocked with shampoos and body wash and bubble bath. The hiking trails were lovely, especially with the fall colors, though due to drought, we were only able to see a trickle at the waterfall.
Our only complaint was that although the queen sized bed in the bedroom was very comfortable, the two alternate sleeping accommodations were not! One was a very hard twin sized futon and the other was a blow up mattress that lost air throughout the night, resulting in one of us tossing and turning half the night and not getting a good night's sleep. So, if there are only two people in your party, we'd suggest sleeping together in the bed. We'd also recommend bringing along ear plugs (we had a heads up to do so from someone who'd stayed there previously) because those very handsome roosters start crowing quite early!

Ruby goes above and beyond for her guest! Her kindness is felt, and she made us a delicious anniversary cake!
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ 5 stars!
Ruby is a wonderful host. The farm is real and working so expect animal noises and activity. But it’s worth the stay.
This is a great place to stay. Just a few minutes from town and trails to walk, animals to love on.
This is a great place to stay, the home is beautiful, the trails are great, and Ruby is really kind and helpful! Would love to come again!!
We enjoyed our stay at Ruby’s sweet farm. The house was cozy and well stocked! The bed was very comfortable. We were in town for a wedding at Matthews Century Farm and this was the ideal location!
Rubys place was adorable and super clean lots of books everything that it said it was. I would recommend her place to anyone.
Ruby is the best host! She makes you feel so at home and my family was so grateful for the peaceful space. We will definitely be returning!
Amazing place to relax!

We had such a lovely time on Ruby's farm! The accommodations were excellent, her advice on walking trails and places to watch the sunset were great, and we had a blast seeing all the animals going about their day. My wife and I can't wait to come back!

Absolutely wonderful. Excellent book selection, very tastefully decorated, and so comfortable. The animals were great! My daughter loved seeing the little horse! Will be coming back for a longer stay!
Charming, enjoyable Carriage house and working farm! Location as described in listing. Ruby very friendly and helpful. Would stay again!
I came to get away from home, relax and recharge. Ruby was wonderful and the carriage house was a perfect place to get away.
Great stay, definitely worth if you are passing through Kansas City / St Joseph area.
Wonderful getaway. Ruby has a beautiful property. Really enjoyed hiking around her property and seeing the waterfall, rock bridge, and the animals. Felt extremely comfortable staying here.
Nice place to stay if you're looking for a country getaway!

I'm heartbroken we were only there for 2 nights! We were just in town for the weekend for a wedding and we were so busy running around we didn't get nearly enough time to explore and enjoy this beautiful little home. So sweet, so quaint and comfy. I love the reclaimed doors and all the hidden bonuses (there's a cabinet full of games). Beautiful little kitchen I would have loved to use with plenty of dishware, coffee pods ready to go, and we very much appreciated the ice in the freezer and Brita pitcher in the fridge. Lovely shower gels and plenty of towels, the tub is a little small but still comfy for a bath and the shower has a range of good pressures with different settings (depending on what you prefer from hard to gentle but consistent). There's even a washer and dryer, this little place is literally a full home that I could have happily stayed in for a week or longer!
We did hear the animals, the chickens (crowing roosters) and ducks (chatting in honks as they waddle along) wander through the yard, but I heard them more from the bathroom and they didn't bother me from the bedroom. We met two cats who were very friendly once they knew we wanted to say hi and give them pets.
GO SLOW on the driveway because the birds and cats might be out there! Use g.maps or something to give you directions because it is out in the country and would have been easy to drive past without g.maps tracking/directing us.
Ruby was super on top of communication and her little carriage house is a wonderful little home away from home.
My co-adventurer said "a great, relaxing little haven in our travels."

Ruby has a little piece of paradise. If you like being in the country, close to animals, away from the city traffic, this is the place for you. Everything you could need is available in the carriage house. We very much enjoyed our stay.
Ruby's place was really cute! I loved the walking trails and waking up to the rooster!!

Sheer perfection!! My husband and I absolutely loved Ruby's Carriage House with our two sons; 4 and 8 months. We are from the suburbs of Chicago and it was just the change of scenery we needed for our vacation. We enjoy all of the farm animals, and my son absolutely loved greeting Percy, the horse, each morning and before bedtime. He's still talking about him too. We didn't have the best weather and had to compete with rain and clouds the majority of our visit, so we enjoyed going downtown to Kansas City one day to Science City and then enjoyed picking peaches and blackberries at the Weston Orchard. If you are going to Weston, we fell in love with the BBQ at Tin Kitchen and highly recommend it.
If you're looking to go into town in St. Joseph, it's the most beautiful drive through the country and not that bad of a drive. The house is very well-equipped with everything and anything you will need. I feel that Ruby has been thoughtful in thinking through the little details. It was our first experience with Airbnb and we realized also how beneficial having a washer and dryer on vacation with little kids...that was a life saver! If you're staying at Ruby's we highly recommend getting something delicious to enjoy. Although she wasn't catering the week we were there, she still supplied us with delicious cinnamon rolls and a wonderful cake that was divine. We can't wait to return for her other meals. We had such a positive experience that my husband and I have already talked if we take a kid free weekend in the fall in the future to enjoy ourselves and when our next trip back will be. Ruby's place will be #1 on our list. We also shared our positive experience with others we know in St. Joseph and they were intrigued to even consider a weekend getaway locally too. We can't say enough good things about Ruby's and highly recommend you do yourself a favor and check it out if you're considering it.

We had the most amazing weekend at the carriage house. We scheduled meals and a cake ahead of time with Ruby and everything was so healthy, wholesome and wonderful! The cake wasn’t healthy - lol, but it was the most perfect y cake I have been had in my life! We enjoyed the animals, the grounds, a hike, feeding Percy apples and getting to know him ❤️ the stars on a clear night are spectacular! The carriage house is well equipped, clean and cozy. We enjoyed reading together and playing cards. Such a wonderful place to get away from the city to relax and unwind. Ruby was the most amazing host and everyone, including all of the animals were so friendly and loving! We want to go back in a cooler season. ❤️

The cottage is cool and cosy. A full kitchen is available. At night you can see the stars clearly. Next to the cottage is a small working farm. Dogs,cats, chickens, roosters and a pony plus bats and fireflies at night. A perfect escape from the city. I highly recommend. And St Joe is only eight minutes away.

Ruby is the most wonderful host! She made us feel right at home.
The horses were amazing as well as the expansive property with many fun surprises!
We hope to return just as soon as we can! My daughter is 8 and she still, hours later now, has not stopped talking about it.
The house was absolutely adorable. Both Ruby and the lovely animals made us feel very welcome. It was clean, homey, and made for the perfect honeymoon!

A lovely, very welcoming and comfortable little house, with everything in good working order. Super clean, lots of neat little personal touches. The property was peaceful and fun. We could barely hear the roosters from the bedroom, it seemed quiet to us all night. We knew that the host Ruby was on site but we never actually saw her (our choice.) She responded right away to questions and was very helpful.
Loved this place! Wonderfully quiet time on the farm.
Great experience and peaceful setting! The house was clean and exactly like it was described. Would definitely recommend!

It was a lovely place to stay with such peace and kindness. It was so helpful for my soul.
I will say please read the description for the sound. It is a small working farm and with that comes sounds. There is a sound machine in the bedroom that was helpful.
It was a nice place to rest and if you are a runner a nearby dirt road offers some challenging hills.
The kitchen is well equipped with pans and even a blender that works fabulously. The porch is shaded for the first part of the day, allowing for an easy rising with a lovely cup of coffee or tea.

Very nice, clean, comfortable and well stocked! The bathroom is upstairs, as is the bedroom. The stairs turn at the top and the railing doesn't start until the 6th step from the top. I learned the hard way on the slippery wood steps not to do it in socks. Ruby is very good at communicating in timely fashion. We were prepared for roosters and farm noises, but the dogs barked all night, and are close by, in the pen. We had ear plugs and used the white noise machine (which is a thoughtful touch!) but we didn't sleep well and ended up leaving a day early so we could get a good night's sleep before going back to work. If you can sleep though barking you'll be fine. We didn't see any goats and only saw one horse and the pig, lots of chickens and the dogs. The animals we saw are friendly and fun to visit. Parking is close and entry is easy. It's a very nice place to stay! Ruby recommended we visit the town of Weston, which we did, and enjoyed it very much! There are a lot of cool historical things to do nearby.

A fantastic getaway. The Carriage House is the perfect place for a vacationing couple who would prefer something off the beaten path. It's wonderfully comfortable and just the right size. Having chickens wandering around crowing is a benefit! And of course there's the pony and pig to feed some apples and carrots to. I can't recommend the Carriage House enough. Ruby and her husband are a delight.

We had an exceptional experience during our short family trip. Our 5 year old loved seeing and interacting with the horses, pig, chickens, ducks, turkeys, cats and dogs. The Carriage House was perfect for our stay with our 2 children (5 and 1). It is very well maintained, clean, and comfortable. Ruby's hospitality was beyond expectations. The location is a short drive from easy trails for kids to walk in addition to a very short walk to a little waterfall on a creek and plenty of room to roam in the fields. I would recommend this rental to anyone! Note: this a farm with a lot of grass. There are bugs! But, wearing the provided bug spray, we had no problems.
Ruby was extremely helpful and has just a beautiful spot in the country, felt right at home!
This was my second time staying here because I absolutely love it! I hope to be back for a third visit!

Our stay was more of a business trip for me, but was hoping to enjoy some country living. Unfortunately, I got food poisoning (not from here), and had to stay put for our stay. Ruby went out of her way to help us so I could be ready for my work event. The carriage house had all we needed and more. The property is a real working farm so there is some animal noises, but we got used to the roosters and barking dogs quicker than we thought. We wished we had time to take in the whole property, but that will be for another visit.

Hidden little gem! Be aware that you will hear their farm dog barking to keep away anything that may try to get close to the chickens and other fan animals at night, but she is the sweetest thing ever.

Beautiful place and awesome accommodations. Conveniently located to a number of communities and activities. Ruby is such a friendly host and made sure our stay was fun and comfortable. Had a great time and hope to return someday.

Our family loves staying at Ruby’s and hanging out on her farm. She is very accommodating and welcoming. She truly makes you feel at home. And all of the animals are so friendly! This was our second time there, and we’ll be back again!

What a lovely stay. So glad our friends recommended it to us. We'll definitely be suggesting it to more friends. It was the perfect short getaway for our family of four. Our toddler loved meeting all the animals. We enjoyed the easy hike to the waterfall. Ruby was super accomodating and cooked us a delicious dinner. Homemade pasta, what a treat! The location was quiet and peaceful and a great jumping off point for day trips to St. Joseph and Weston. We wouldn't hesitate to book again.

This was my second stay. Wonderful, relaxing as usual. Ruby is a fabulous host, very accommodating. The farm is beautiful, the animals friendly. Definitely going back. This place is comfortable and safe. I would feel very safe traveling there alone. Perfect for a retreat and getting your mind calm.

Quaint country home nestled in the rolling hills near Weston and Saint Joseph. Everything we needed was available. Horses and active roosters added to the country charm. Enjoyed exploring the property and the hiking trails behind the home.

If I had more start to rate I would give more. Ruby is the nicest person I have ever booked with. She makes you feel at home. This place is amazing. Recommend 1000%
Thank you again Ruby ❤️

Ruby’s place was exactly what my husband and I need for a quick weekend get away. The animals are amazing and roaming around, the hiking trail was great and she made us dinner our first night there that was very delicious. If you’re looking to get out of town and detach from your phone and computer, I highly recommend this place.
Hidden Gem!! Historic farmhouse on a 40 acre farm surrounded by nature and farm animals!! Ruby was great with communication and everything was perfect for stay!
Cute & relaxing place to stay with warm welcoming hospitality by the hostess. Love the farm animals♡
This is a must stay! The hiking trails are so beautiful! The farm animals make it such a beautiful experience. Skip the hotels and book this stay! We will for sure be back!
Ruby is a wonderful host and the farm is interesting and excellent! The bed was extremely comfortable. The animals were so cool.
We had a wonderful time and Ruby could not have been more gracious! This farm is steeped in history and a magical place. We’ll be back!

Spotlessly clean, tidy, and comfortable. A fantastic place to get away for a few days. The barnyard animals were delightful. I will miss hearing roosters crowing outside my windows tonight! Highly recommended place to stay.
Great location and lovely property for a peaceful get away! Close and convenient to st. Joseph and the host is very responsive and kind!
My son and I adored our stay. All the amenities you could need, so many fun animals to interact with, fantastic hiking, and immecible hosting. We look forward to our next stay!
This was our second time staying and we had a wonderful time! It is our favorite get away!

This place is AMAZING! It was the perfect weekend vacation ...but we could have stayed longer for sure! The food was great with hotel like service. My littles throughly enjoyed the animals and getting out of city life for a little bit. We will be back!

Ruby is an amazing host! Her property is beautiful and her attention to detail is impeccable. Everything I needed, she provided. I loved playing with the farm animals and walking the beautiful trails. I highly recommend staying at her AirBnB, you won’t regret it!

The space was super clean and cute! The farm animals were delightful and the dogs and goats greeted our car with great joy. Ruby was super easy to get ahold of and really accommodating, even when we had to leave early. 12/10 wonderful stay!

This place is wonderful! So peaceful, relaxing. Pet the animals, walk in the woods, watch the birds and just breathe! The place is so comfortable and Ruby has everything you need. Just a short drive to town for seeing the sights. Museums, history, cemeteries. The Missouri river and it's history are very close. Lewis and Clark history and early fur trapper trade in the US was a hub in St. Joe.
Love Love Love this place, going back soon! Already booked! Highly recommend!
